sentences.en: Homeless people forced to panhandle in subway stations.
sentences.cn: 无家可归的人们被迫在地铁站里乞讨.

sentences.en: Issue: The city of Amarillo is located in the Texas panhandle between Potter and Randall Counties.
sentences.cn: 问题: 阿马里诺市位于德克萨斯州波特县与兰德尔县之间的狭长地带中.

sentences.en: Mitchell brought her back to DeFuniak Springs, which is between Pensacola and Tallahassee Panhandle.
sentences.cn: 米切尔带她回威莫茨泉水, 是彭萨科拉之间和塔拉哈西就立刻离开.

sentences.en: The storm spawned a tornado near the Florida panhandle town of Santa Rosa Beach.
sentences.cn: 风暴自圣罗莎海岸狭小的佛罗里达镇蕴积成龙卷风.

sentences.en: Wheeling is located in the northern panhandle of west virginia.
sentences.cn: 惠灵位于西弗吉尼亚州北部的锅柄状地带.

sentences.en: Wheeling is located in the northern panhandle of West Virginia.
sentences.cn: 惠灵位于西弗吉尼亚州俄亥俄河的锅柄状地带.

trans.tran_en: a long, thin area of land that sticks out from a larger area
